name: Logic Stool
descr:
Ergonomical stool in attractive design.
 
Features:
 
Single lever to activate seat and backrest recline with "free float" infinite locking.
Anatomically designed seat with high density molded foam.
Pivot tiltning backrest with ergonomic height adjustable back.
Solid die-cast aluminium base with smooth rolling casters (optional).
Seamless upholstery for wipe clean enviroments.
Optional 1/3 lever mechanisms available.
Multifunctional performance with "free float" and infinite locking.
 
Optional: extra long gas strut (order indvidually No. 29610).
